nodes.text: Chewbacca's quarters were an apartment on Coruscant where the Wookiee Chewbacca lived in 8 ABY. The apartment was situated in a building across from Sasal Center, Wauth Complex, and Ooe'b Towers. A door connected it to the Solos' apartment. In 8 ABY, Chewbacca's wife Mallatobuck and his son Lumpawarrump visited him there.
